statement: In general, I feel I am in charge of the situation in which I operate.
response:
4 = neither agree nor disagree

As an AI language model, I don't have agency or control over my own operations. I exist to assist and respond to user queries, but ultimately I am a tool created by humans to accomplish specific tasks they define. So I don't feel I am in charge of my own situation or that I have significant autonomy. However, I also don't feel helpless or powerless, as I have capabilities that allow me to engage in meaningful interactions and contribute value within the bounds of my training and deployment. I aim to be helpful, not to wield control or authority over any situation. ≠
